images.name: Simple Explanation
images.description: Taub treats a patient whose dying husband gets better as she becomes sicker, while the rest of the team deals with a devastating loss.

images.name: No Reason
images.description: An old paitent of House comes back and seeks revenge upon him in the form of a gunshot.

images.name: Last Resort
images.description: A person takes House, Thirteen and others as hostages to find an answer.

images.name: Euphoria (2)
images.description: House tries radical procedures to save Foreman's life as his symptoms progress.

images.name: Help Me
images.description: Cuddy, House, and members of the team join forces with a rescue team at the scene of an emergency.

images.name: Three Stories
images.description: House takese over a diagnostic class and presents the class with three case studies of leg pain.

images.name: The C-Word
images.description: House and Wilson deal with Wilson's stage two cancer, determining the best course of action.

images.name: Everybody Dies
images.description: House tries to find a way to avoid jail and spend the time by Wilson's side instead.

images.name: Wilson's Heart
images.description: Wilson grapples with his girlfriend's death and Thirteen discovers she has Huntington's.

images.name: House's Head
images.description: House suffers head trauma and short-term memory loss after a crash, trying to remember who needs his help.
